attributes.title: Yang Out with Barbara - #1
attributes.caption: Chad is joined by Ellie Main and Jackie Izawa as they recap RWBY Vol 6 Episode 1, answer question sent in by the community, and interview the voice of Yang: Barbara Dunkelman! Also, get a sneak peek at Volume 6 Chapter 2 of RWBY!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/RWBYRewind1. Chad is joined by Ellie Main and Jackie Izawa as they recap RWBY Vol 6 Episode 1, answer question sent in by the community, and interview the voice of Yang: Barbara Dunkelman! Also, get a sneak peek at Volume 6 Chapter 2 of RWBY!

attributes.title: Exploring Cut Concepts - #2
attributes.caption: Chad, Jackie, and Ellie host RWBY Art Director Pat Rodriguez, the mind behind the designs of tons of your favorite RWBY Characters.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2SiXynY. Chad, Jackie, and Ellie host RWBY Art Director Pat Rodriguez, the mind behind the designs of tons of your favorite RWBY Characters. They discuss Vol 6 Episode 2, answer your questions and theories, and dive into some of the unused concept art in RWBY. Also, a First Look at Volume 6 Chapter 3.

attributes.title: RWBY Lore Keeper - #3
attributes.caption: Chad, Ellie, & Jacke recap a lore-packed RWBY episode and interview Eddy Rivas, the Lore Keeper.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2DGHKbm. Chad, Ellie, & Jackie recap a lore-packed RWBY episode and interview Eddy Rivas, the Lore Keeper. They cover Vol 6 Episode 3, respond to your questions and theories, and give Eddy an impossible test. Also, a First Look at Volume 6 Chapter 4.

attributes.title: The Mind(s) of Ozpin - #4
attributes.caption: Chad, Ellie and Jackie dive into the mind(s) of Ozpin as they interview special guest Shannon McCormick! They also recap Volume 6 Episode 4 of RWBY, respond to your questions and theories, and look at a sneak peek of Volume 6 Chapter 5.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2SfIsPS. Chad, Ellie and Jackie dive into the mind(s) of Ozpin as they interview special guest Shannon McCormick! They also recap Volume 6 Episode 4 of RWBY, respond to your questions and theories, and look at a sneak peek of Volume 6 Chapter 5.

attributes.title: RWBY Remixed - #5
attributes.caption: RWBY Rewind explores the sounds and music of RWBY with Audio Lead Chris Kokkinos.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2PavJfj. RWBY Rewind explores the sounds and music of RWBY with Audio Lead Chris Kokkinos. Chad, Ellie, and Jackie also cover Volume 6 Chapter 5 of RWBY, answer questions from the community, and take a look at what RWBY would be like with a different musical direction.

attributes.title: Ruby Rose Returns! - #6
attributes.caption: RWBY Rewind is joined by Ruby herself: Lindsay Jones! Chad, Ellie, and Jackie recap Volume 6 Episode 6 of RWBY, answer questions from the community, and challenge Lindsay to THE LIGHTNING ROUND!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2E4h2IP. RWBY Rewind is joined by Ruby herself: Lindsay Jones! Chad, Ellie, and Jackie recap Volume 6 Episode 6 of RWBY, answer questions from the community, and challenge Lindsay to THE LIGHTNING ROUND!

attributes.title: The Reaper of RWBY - #7
attributes.caption: Maria Calavera joins in on the RWBY Rewind action!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2RW6oIp. Maria Calavera joins in on the RWBY Rewind action! Chad, Ellie, and Jackie recap Volume 6: Episode 7 of RWBY, answer questions from the community, and have a chat with Melissa Sternenberg about this season of RWBY.

attributes.title: Justifying Jaune's Anger - #8
attributes.caption: Join Chad, Ellie, and Jackie as they interview Miles Luna, recap Volume 6 Chapter 8 of RWBY, and answer your questions about the episode!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2GxvP1S. Join Chad, Ellie, and Jackie as they interview Miles Luna, recap Volume 6 Chapter 8 of RWBY, and answer your questions about the episode! Can Miles survive THE LIGHTNING ROUND?

attributes.title: Shipping RWBY with Captain Yssa - #9
attributes.caption: Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and returning host Yssa Badiola as they recap Volume 6 Chapters 9 and 10 of RWBY. Prepare for an in-depth look at your theories, reactions, and the rare DOUBLE LIGHTNING ROUND.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2D4diGr. Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and returning host Yssa Badiola as they recap Volume 6 Chapters 9 and 10 of RWBY. Prepare for an in-depth look at your theories, reactions, and the rare DOUBLE LIGHTNING ROUND.

attributes.title: Barbara and the RWBY Bumblebees - #10
attributes.caption: Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and the return of the voice of Yang- Barbara Dunkelman! They recap Volume 6 episode 11 of RWBY, dive into your theories, reactions, Bumblebee speculation, and more! Will Barbara be ready this time for the LIGHTNING ROUND?
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2szDnXZ. Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and the return of the voice of Yang- Barbara Dunkelman! They recap Volume 6 episode 11 of RWBY, dive into your theories, reactions, Bumblebee speculation, and more! Will Barbara be ready this time for the LIGHTNING ROUND?

attributes.title: Kerry Reveals RWBY Fates - #11
attributes.caption: Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and RWBY show runner Kerry Shawcross as they recap Volume 6 Episode 12 and 13 of RWBY, look at theories for Volume 7 of RWBY, and put to rest some of the more mysterious questions involving RWBY lore in the LIGHTNING ROUND!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2BeQd2p. Join Chad, Ellie, Jackie, and RWBY show runner Kerry Shawcross as they recap Volume 6 Episode 12 and 13 of RWBY, look at theories for Volume 7 of RWBY, and put to rest some of the more mysterious questions involving RWBY lore in the LIGHTNING ROUND!
